title: Belkin USB 3.0 Dual Video Docking Stand for Windows 8 Tablets (2.1 Amp)
description: The Belkin USB 3.0 Dual Video Windows 8 Tablet Docking Stand provides a SuperSpeed connection to desktop peripherals and enhanced desktop productivity. The sturdy, ergonomic dock stand holds the tablet for viewing together with 2 external displays and using with a keyboard, mouse and other peripherals to enhance desktop productivity. Add 2 high-resolution displays (Display Port and DVI-I, or VGA with included adapter), Keyboard & Mouse, wired Ethernet, 2.1 audio with Speaker/Headphone/Microphone, and storage or a printer. One USB 3.0 port supports 2.1A fast charging for mobile devices (smartphones and tablets), and a standard lock slot provides security from theft.
